list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Add shutdown function to turn off current server
Added new variable:
PRE_AUTORUN_SETUP="no"
This will determine if setup need to run automatically after build ISO and auto login into the SSH server. If use 'no' means, it will not run setup and need to manually do that, when specifying no, the system will not execute --setup argument but instead it will execute this:
ssh_login "${BOX_HOSTNAME_FQDN}:${SSH_PORT}" "root:${ROOT_USERNAME}" "${SCRIPT_PATH}/reboot_ssh.sh"
The content of the reboot_ssh.sh is as follow:
-- #!/bin/bash # TODO will make the name of the script dynamic. Do not use 'maxisetup' # This script will only shutdown the current server that has script in it cd /root || exit 1 chmod +x maxisetup touch maxisetup.log ./maxisetup --shutdown-server 2>&1 | tee maxisetup.log echo "" --

task.summary: Default task
Remove setup data and clear bash history automatically after 120 seconds after installation.

Updated linode_api_admin function Updated configure_maxicloud function Created standalone function configure_da_admin_accounts specific for creating admin account (no reseller) Created standalone function configure_da_reseller_accounts specific for creating reseller accounts
Now we are able to create multiple seller accounts, multiple domains, emails for this reseller accounts, and reseller are now able to request ssl certificate for its own domain. Previously resellers were not able to request ssl.
Reseller has new variables. This is the full set of new reseller variables:
# === DA reseller start === # This is DA main reseller. Create at least one reseller here (cannot use '+' for password) DA_RESELLER_USERNAME1="da_reseller" DA_RESELLER_USERPASS1=*long-secured-password*" DA_RESELLER_SYSTEM_EMAIL1="webmaster@sofibox.com" DA_RESELLER_MAIL_USER1=("webmaster@sofibox.com" "info@sofibox.com") DA_RESELLER_MAIL_PASSWORD1=("A*longemailpass" "BlongemailPass*") # This is the main reseller package DA_RESELLER_PACKAGE_NAME1="RESELLER_UNLIMITED" # This is different from BOX_DOMAIN DA_RESELLER_DOMAIN1=("sofibox.com") DA_RESELLER_SUBDOMAIN1=("sofibox.com:sales+login+secure") # shared or assign - If shared, domain will use the server's main ip. assign will use one of the reseller's ips DA_RESELLER_IP_TYPE1="shared" DA_RESELLER_DOMAIN_ENABLE_SSL1="yes" DA_RESELLER_SSL_SUB_NAME1=("letsencrypt:sofibox.com:www+ftp+mail+pop+smtp+sales+secure+login") # === DA reseller end ===
User also has new syntax on variable DA_USER_SUBDOMAIN[index]
old variable syntax for DA_USER_SUBDOMAIN: DA_USER_SUBDOMAIN1=("sales+maxibi.com" "login+maxibi.com" "sub1.sub2+maxibi.com" "sub3.test.com" "test4.test.com")
new variable syntax for DA_USER_SUBDOMAIN is equivalent to above (much shorter): DA_USER_SUBDOMAIN1=("maxibi.com:sales+login" "test.com:sub3+test4")
Added more code comments
Added a new API to set logo Directadmin logo (default logo and dark logo)

Added API to customize DA skin even further like customize the date and time customize menu for roundcube and phpmyadmin and more.
New variable for PHPMYADMIN_CUSTOM_NAME="name"
Besides the old variable of this:
# This will show in the roundcube product name and DA menu ROUNDCUBE_CUSTOM_NAME="MyMail"
Now we have new variable for phpmyadmin custom name: PHPMYADMIN_CUSTOM_NAME="MyDB"
This custom name will automatically display on the new DA menu
Related:
If you define this 2 variables like this
ROUNDCUBE_LOGIN_ROUTE="/newrcroute" PHPMYADMIN_LOGIN_ROUTE="/newdbroute"
This will automatically link to the above route:
ROUNDCUBE LINK: https://server.test.com/newrcroute PHPMYADMIN LINK: https://server.test.com/newdbroute
If you set SECURE_HTTPASSWD_LOGIN_ROUTE="yes"
The above 2 custom routes will be protected with another layer of apache directory protection. This will help to prevent bruteforce attack on roundcube and phpmyadmin.

Changed the API authentication syntax from
start+<user/role>
to
signas+<user/role>
eg: signas+owner -> This means the first system owner will be signed in to use da_api_admin
You can even do this (specified username and password) signas+${username}+${password}
Improved da_api_admin "set-da-options"
Added new da_api_admin for "modify-user" where we are able to modify the name, email, nameservers, skin selection of a specified user
Removed curl --max-time option to prevent timeout because requesting certificate needs more time and decreasing this value will fail the certification request
Added new separate function to configure owner account called configure_da_owner_accounts()
Added letsencrypt staging testing to check if domain has no error when requesting real certificate.
TODO: Skip domain ssl certificate request and resume the certificate request for domains that were not able to request ssl certificate. Resume means, rerun the whole script.
New variables for maxisetup.conf
DA_OWNER_NAME[INDEX] DA_ADMIN_NAME[INDEX] DA_RESELLER_NAME[INDEX] DA_USER_NAME[INDEX]

Added new API to add custom security questions and answers for all users (owner, admins, resellers and normal users).
Able to use add multiple security questions (one question with one answer)
Added function to validate config files. It will complain if variables are not set correctly. For example this variable:
DA_ADMIN_USERPASS
The validate config function will not allow username to have more than 64 characters and it must be a minimum of 6 characters. It also cannot contain both character '&' and '+'. Previously this check was done during installation (wasn't good). It should check before script running.
Added a new function to manage skin config for owner called configure_da_owner_skins()
Added a new function to manage skin config for reseller called configure_da_reseller_skins()
TODO: Able to create multiple admin accounts

Improved config checking for adding multiple admin users
Removed optional TODO for check_finish_reboot() because it is not good to resume installation without user interaction.
Moved SSHD config recommended by lynis to secure_box() function
Added few options to harden DA installation in harden_da() function (more will come in here)
Added new function for configuring maxinis called configure_maxinis(). This binary will manage lynis binary
Added an option to disable core dump as suggested by lynis in harden_with_lynis(). Any lynis suggestion will go here (TODO: scan with lynis, get the scan ID and automatically fixed the issue based on common solutions)

Added update and upgrade command to update repo cache
Added function configure_maxicron() that will be used to manage startup:
# It will disable startup programs, able to create cronjob easily # Able to create cronjob with 5 seconds timer which is not available in stock cronjob # Can enable and disable cronjob easily # Can list all cronjobs, delete edit remove
Added extra command to disable core dumps for all users
Improved config file check for DA_<ROLE>_SUBDOMAIN and DA_<ROLE>_SSL_SUB_NAME
Added extra security option for harden_da for issue related to invalid certificate

Added external websetup script to customize websites configuration in configure_da_custom_webs(). To enable this feature add ENABLE_CUSTOM_WEB_SETUP="yes" in maxisetup.conf
Improved config checking for Directadmin username length based on maxisetup.conf. The script will set the username length config before changing existing username or adding new username.
Fixed reseller and user did not enable PHP access when creating default unlimited package. This causes user is not able to execute PHP unless manually enable the PHP package from reseller level. This is because of the usage forward slash in API data.
Changed the harden_da() function to configure_da() because this function not only for securing Directadmin but to set Directadmin extra settings such as defining the online help path to "help.sofibox.com"
Added new API to set Directadmin Admin settings
Added new API to set Directadmin Server, Security and Email settings
Updated new maxicron script from maxicode
New maxisetup.conf variables:
DA_MAX_UNAME_LENGTH="" LUKS_PASS="*LUKS-DISK-ENCRYPTION*" BOX_TYPE="" BOX_RAM="" BOX_SWAP="" BOX_NS1="" BOX_NS2="" BOX_NS3="" BOX_NS4=""

Fixed maxida --switch-da option that was not able to switch to Directadmin stable version.
Previously:
maxida --switch-da beta = will switch directadmin to pre-release version
maxida --switch-da stable = will switch directadmin to stable version (previously it did not work due to checking error)
Created a new Directadmin API for creating new database with new user with action "create-database"
Created a new Directadmin APi for creating new database with existing user with action "create-user-database"
Security options and answers are now optional settings. If you do not want to create security questions and answers leave the variable like this:
DA_USER_SECURITY_Q1="" DA_USER_SECURITY_A1=""
If either security question or security answer has empty string like above, the script will skip adding security question on that user
New variables:
# <domain>:<platform_name>:<platform_version> DA_<ROLE>_ROOT_WEB_TYPE1=("sofibox.com:odoo:14")
#<domain_name>:<db_name>:<db_user>:<db_password> DA_<ROLE>_DB1=("sofibox.com:db_name:db_user:*db-password*" "sofibox.com:db_name2:db_user2:*db-password*" "sofibox.com:db_name2:abcd:*db-password*")
DA_HELP_DOMAIN="help.sofibox.com"
# Note: Admin and owner shouldn't have database. Only user and reseller are able to use database for security purpose.
Fixed websetup source file invalid path

Fixed trap function terminated running script when trying to run this script as a second instance. It should only notify that a script is running and exit not terminated all other instances.
Added new readme about LUKS encryption - step by step procedures to create LUKS encryption on Debian and CentOS (private repo)
Added prestashop platform files to automatically install prestashop website based on user variable DA_RESELLER_ROOT_WEB_TYPE[INDEX] from the config (pending function)
Improved Directadmin restart condition to force restart if waiting time is longer than 60 seconds
Fixed typo CMD_API_SECURITY_QUESTIONS does not exist but CMD_SECURITY_QUESTIONS does based on this: https://forum.directadmin.com/threads/cmd_api-have-way-to-change-php-version-of-unique-account.62965/#post-327435
Added sudo installation for distribution that doesn't have sudo installed by default
Fixed after changing network interface name from the function configure_net, we must also include network information (including the interface name) by calling configure_net2 before system reboot. Without this we won't have proper network connection for SSH.
Changed variable IPV6_ADD to IPV6_ADD0 and IPV6_DEF_GATEWAY to IPV6_DEF_GATEWAY0 to allow multiple IPv6 addresses in the future
Added option to build mysql or mariadb based on maxisetup.conf config file.
New variable for installing sql:
# Format <sql_type>-<sql_version> CB_MYSQL_INS="mariadb-10.5" # or eg: mysql-8.0

Improved documentation LUKS.md (private repo) Increased max_wait value for restarting wait time for 120 seconds Fixed missing argument for set max_username_length Fixed checking mysqld process doesn't detect running mysql process when using pgrep command. Changed code from
if pgrep -x "mysqld" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
to
if command -v mysqld &>/dev/null; then

Added new variable CSF_DENY_IP_LIMIT to increase DENY_IP_LIMIT from 200 (default) to any values. This one was missing feature. Added speedtest.net installation in post_setup() Added the ability to automatically unlock LUKS encryption remotely and run maxisetup automatically. Other changes ... especially in maxida, maxiwall, websetup .. other extra things
Update small changes, add debug line to debug new version of DA 1.62 (some API has changed as reported)

Add shutdown function to turn off current server
Added new variable:
PRE_AUTORUN_SETUP="no"
This will determine if setup need to run automatically after build ISO and auto login into the SSH server. If use 'no' means, it will not run setup and need to manually do that, when specifying no, the system will not execute --setup argument but instead it will execute this:
ssh_login "${BOX_HOSTNAME_FQDN}:${SSH_PORT}" "root:${ROOT_USERNAME}" "${SCRIPT_PATH}/reboot_ssh.sh"
The content of the reboot_ssh.sh is as follow:
-- #!/bin/bash # TODO will make the name of the script dynamic. Do not use 'maxisetup' # This script will only shutdown the current server that has script in it cd /root || exit 1 chmod +x maxisetup touch maxisetup.log ./maxisetup --shutdown-server 2>&1 | tee maxisetup.log echo "" --
